title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.230 - Operating revenue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.230 - Operating revenue

State Regulations

Operating revenue includes revenue directly related to
the rendering of patient care services and revenue from nonpatient care
services to patients and sales and activities to persons other than
patients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.230

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
